gw.api.util

Class LocationUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.util.LocationUtil

  • public class LocationUtil
extends Object
    Utilities for PCF locations.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static com.guidewire.pl.web.navigation.wizard.Wizard ActiveWizardInCurrentLocationGroup
      static boolean CurrentLocationEditable
      Is the current location editable? Use with caution, just because the current location is editable doesn't mean the current control is editable. Use hideIfReadOnly and hideIfEditable instead of this method wherever possible.

      • Fields inherited from class java.lang.Object

        Class

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void addRequestScopedErrorMessage(String message)
      Add an error message to be shown when displaying the response to the current request. The message will appear near the top of the page, preceded by an icon indicating that it is an error message. The message will not persist in subsequent requests, unless this method is explicitly called again.
      static void addRequestScopedInfoMessage(String message)
      Add an informational message to be shown when displaying the response to the current request. The message will appear near the top of the page, preceded by an icon indicating that it is an informational message. The message will not persist in subsequent requests, unless this method is explicitly called again.
      static void addRequestScopedWarningMessage(String message)
      Add a warning message to be shown when displaying the response to the current request. The message will appear near the top of the page, preceded by an icon indicating that it is a warning message. The message will not persist in subsequent requests, unless this method is explicitly called again.
      static com.guidewire.pl.web.navigation.wizard.Wizard getActiveWizardInCurrentLocationGroup()
      static boolean hasOwnBundle(com.guidewire.pl.web.navigation.Location location)
      Returns false if the given location shares a bundle with its parent location.
      static boolean isCurrentLocationEditable()
      Is the current location editable? Use with caution, just because the current location is editable doesn't mean the current control is editable. Use hideIfReadOnly and hideIfEditable instead of this method wherever possible.
      static void warnUnsavedChanges(com.guidewire.pl.web.navigation.Location location)
      Generates warnings on unsaved field changes in the location bundle. This method throws {@link com.guidewire.pl.system.bundle.validation.EntityValidationException}, if any warning. This method can be invoked for a simple location to show unsaved changes to the user, when the location bundle can not be committed due to concurrent data change. For a location with complex bean graph, specialized handling is typlically required to present data changes in a meaningful way.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • ActiveWizardInCurrentLocationGroup

        com.guidewire.pl.web.navigation.wizard.Wizard ActiveWizardInCurrentLocationGroup

      • CurrentLocationEditable

        boolean CurrentLocationEditable
        Is the current location editable? Use with caution, just because the current location is editable doesn't mean the current control is editable. Use hideIfReadOnly and hideIfEditable instead of this method wherever possible.

    • Method Detail

      • addRequestScopedErrorMessage

        void addRequestScopedErrorMessage(String message)
        Add an error message to be shown when displaying the response to the current request. The message will appear near the top of the page, preceded by an icon indicating that it is an error message. The message will not persist in subsequent requests, unless this method is explicitly called again.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to display, must not be null

      • addRequestScopedInfoMessage

        void addRequestScopedInfoMessage(String message)
        Add an informational message to be shown when displaying the response to the current request. The message will appear near the top of the page, preceded by an icon indicating that it is an informational message. The message will not persist in subsequent requests, unless this method is explicitly called again.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to display, must not be null

      • addRequestScopedWarningMessage

        void addRequestScopedWarningMessage(String message)
        Add a warning message to be shown when displaying the response to the current request. The message will appear near the top of the page, preceded by an icon indicating that it is a warning message. The message will not persist in subsequent requests, unless this method is explicitly called again.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to display, must not be null

      • getActiveWizardInCurrentLocationGroup

      • hasOwnBundle

        boolean hasOwnBundle(com.guidewire.pl.web.navigation.Location location)
        Returns false if the given location shares a bundle with its parent location.
        Parameters:
        location -
        Returns:

      • isCurrentLocationEditable

        boolean isCurrentLocationEditable()
        Is the current location editable? Use with caution, just because the current location is editable doesn't mean the current control is editable. Use hideIfReadOnly and hideIfEditable instead of this method wherever possible.
        Returns:

      • warnUnsavedChanges

        void warnUnsavedChanges(com.guidewire.pl.web.navigation.Location location)
        Generates warnings on unsaved field changes in the location bundle. This method throws {@link com.guidewire.pl.system.bundle.validation.EntityValidationException}, if any warning.

        This method can be invoked for a simple location to show unsaved changes to the user, when the location bundle can not be committed due to concurrent data change. For a location with complex bean graph, specialized handling is typlically required to present data changes in a meaningful way.

        Parameters:
        location - the location
